snippet: The elbow injury sustained by Mets pitcher Matt Harvey is covered by workers’ compensation insurance.
abstract: Elbow injury sustained by New York Mets pitcher Matt Harvey is covered, partly, by workers’ compensation insurance; Mets organization will pick up the rest of the cost.
lead_paragraph: The elbow injury sustained by Mets pitcher Matt Harvey is covered by workers’ compensation insurance.

headline.main: Mets’ Harvey Is Covered Like Any Other Employee With a Workplace Injury
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Harvey Is Covered Like Any Other Employee With a Workplace Injury
